title: Jennifer Lopez appears exhausted as she arrives on set of Marry Me to re-shoot scenes
text:
She recently revealed her ideal schedule was staying up til 5am and then sleeping until noon.

So it was no surprise that night owl Jennifer Lopez didn't seem too thrilled to be awake early on Wednesday morning in New York City.

The 50-year-old was pictured on set of her new movie, Marry Me, and appeared to be redoing a scene from the day before.

Tired: Jennifer Lopez looked worn out on Wednesday morning as she arrived on the set of her new movie, Marry Me, in New York City

Jennifer opted for a white sweater and tracksuit pants set.

She kept extra warm with a taupe colored long-line coat and completed her look with a pair of white sneakers.

The mom-of-two styled her brunette tresses up into a natural top-knot and carried around a hot drink tumbler around.

Comfort first: Jennifer opted for a white sweater and tracksuit pants set

Warm and comfortable: She kept extra warm with a taupe colored long-line coat and completed her look with a pair of white sneakers

Jennifer was makeup free and showed off her glowing complexion.

She was later seen with her hair and makeup complete and rocking the same ensemble as she was pictured in on Tuesday.

The fiancee of Alex Rodriguez stunned in a one-sleeve silver sequin dress for a red carpet scene in uptown Manhattan.

Jennifer kept warm in a white bathrobe ahead of the director calling 'action.'

Ready for action: She was later seen with her hair and makeup complete and rocking the same ensemble as she was pictured in on Tuesday

Comfort until the last minute: Jennifer kept warm in a white bathrobe ahead of the director calling 'action'

Pop-star: She was later seen with her hair and makeup complete and rocking the same ensemble as she was pictured in on Tuesday (pictured)

In video obtained by Mail Online, the Jenny From The Block singer was seen shooing the red carpet scene with her co-stars, Owen Wilson and Maluma.

Marry Me, is based on the Bobby Crosby's web comic in which a romantically desperate pop star sees a fan holding a 'Marry Me' sign and takes him up on the offer.

Jennifer plays leading lady, Kat Valdes, who is left at the altar by her rocker fiance, Bastian, played by Maluma.

It is at this chaotic wedding, held in Madison Square Garden, that she spots her fan (Owen) in the crowd and makes him her groom, according to IMDb.
description: The 50-year-old was pictured on set of her new movie, Marry Me, and appeared to be redoing a scene from the day before.
